General.Name: Oncoclinicas do Brasil
General.Description: Oncoclínicas do Brasil Serviços Médicos S.A. provides medical services focused on clinical oncology and radiotherapy in Latin America. It offers services in the areas of chemotherapy, radiotherapy, hormone therapy, molecular target drugs, immunotherapy, bone marrow transplant, catheter heparinization, non-oncological infusions, laser therapy, myelogram - bone marrow biopsy, continuous care, and precision medicine. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida Presidente Juscelino Kubitscheck, nº 510, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04543-906
